metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39975 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: kdc/do_tgs_req.c in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) 1.21 before 1.21.2 has a double free that is reachable if an authenticated user can trigger an authorization-data handling failure. Incorrect data is copied from one ticket to another.

notes.Note: allenpthuang> All versions in the archives are < 1.21, hence not-affected. This CVE only affects 1.21.x.

criterions.comment: krb5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
